short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An Extension by Docclip to capture web content and convert to editable tabular content and merge google drive pdf files.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension provides a means to switch into web-application view.

Web user have the ability to select portions of the web page and export into applications such as Google Sheet, Microsoft Excel, Google Docs, etc.,  The exported data is editable and retains the source format.

Web user may use this application to merge documents.  Users when viewing PDF files of Google Drive in browser tabbed views, this option provides the user to select and sequence these files for merging.
